item.title: Monster Cleaning Inc
item.description: Overview Welcome to Monster Cleaning Inc., located in the heart of an RPG world! After nasty battles, these monsters need a good scrub. You need to use the right-sized sponge to clean it. Your cleaning skills will be judged by the monsters themselves, and their ratings will determine your success. Can you earn that coveted five-star review? Step up, clean them up quickly and get them ready for their next encounter! My role as User Experience Designer This game was crafted for Game Maker’s Toolkit 2024.

item.title: Thoughts Out!
item.description: Overview Thoughts Out! is a 3D platform puzzle game set in a dreamlike world where your everyday office troubles morph into an annoying dragon. This dragon can alter the surrounding environment, making your adventure either easier or more challenging. How can you drive it out of your daydream and reclaim your peace of mind? Calm down and first, listen to what Miss Bellflower has to say. My role as User Experience Designer Collaborating with a team of eight individuals, we embraced various roles to enhance the project.

item.title: Absinthe Tails
item.description: Overview Take a sip of absinthe, and join this green-hued quest for a lost, fuzzy kitten. Absinthe Tails is a detective game with a dash of absinthe and missing cats. As Claude, a detective with a penchant for spirits, your task is to unravel the mysteries surrounding your quaint town. Armed with photographs from around the town and vibrant dreams to supplement your alcohol-clouded memory, you must piece together the clues to solve the case.

item.title: How should I look today! - a game poem
item.description: Overview Enter the shoes of a social media traveller, eager to discover a land renowned for its unique apple varieties. Your mission: purchase an apple. But blending in proves difficult as locals eye you with suspicion. Can you convince them of your harmless intentions, or will it lead to dire consequences? My role as Game Designer This project was inspired by Jordan Magnuson’s game poems. Dedicated to the events of the Diphu incident of 2018, the game poem delves into the complexities of human behavior towards those unfamiliar to them, encompassing aspects such as appearance, food, culture, and geography.

item.title: HEATWAVE Havoc - A multiplayer cooperative game
item.description: Overview BACKGROUND How might we make the younger generation aware of the impacts of heatwaves? How might we aid them to build empathy for our changing world and people effected by it? How might we make them aware of the adaptation measures during such an event? OBJECTIVE The main goal of this project is to share adaptation measures to be taken during the event of a heatwave. PRODUCT DETAILS HEATWAVE Havoc is a multiplayer card based strategic cooperative game, where you save all your cute little babies from the effects of heatwaves.
